description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- (New feature) Added a 'Group by Description' option in the Auto Tracker and made the grouping table resizable.
- (Improvement) Updated the 'AccountΓÇ»Settings', 'DeleteΓÇ»Account' and 'Reports' links to redirect directly to the target web page, eliminating the need for reΓÇælogging.
- (Improvement) Removed the totalΓÇætime column from the Details window when adding a single item from the Auto Tracker.
- (Fix) Screenshot link: Clicking the screenshots icon now opens the userΓÇÖs account in the last active browser tab, instead of the application trying to determine which Windows user is logged in.
- (Fix) Eliminated flickering in the Details window.
- (Fix) Resolved time gaps in the Auto Tracker.
- (Fix) Fixed a crash that occurred during login.
- (Fix) Fixed an issue that prevented the application from opening.
- (Fix) Fixed the numberΓÇæbox control so that a valid number can be entered when it reaches the maximum value.
